import React from "react"; import profile from "../images/image.jpg"; import { FaGithub } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaInstagram } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaTwitter } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaRegEnvelope } from "react-icons/fa"; function Card() { return (
